request.positivePrompt: Scene: A wooden bridge over a dark, quiet stream guarded by a calm, watchful officer. Character Polizist Paul: 38-year-old, portrait with a magical ethereal appearance and blue aura/glow—consistent magical look in all scenes; standing firm at the bridge. Characters Adrian and Alexander at the entrance to the bridge, Adrian nervous, Alexander supportive. Environment: wooden planks, mossy railing, shimmering blue aura around the officer, soft mist rising from the stream. Mood: tense but kind, moral test atmosphere. Lighting: cool blue accents from the officer's aura, warm bridge glow. Camera perspective: slightly elevated mid-shot focusing on faces and hands. Action verbs: asking, hesitating, singing, listening. Recurring motifs: light and musical motif returning. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting Polizist Paul: Polizist Paul • ['Polizist Paul police officer', ' 38 years'] IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Adrian (5-7y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
